EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.MinioWorkshopConfEmail
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform - Minio Workshop | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Minio For PCF: Private Cloud Storage for Apps Running on Pivotal Cloud Foundry workshop <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/workshops/minio]]> on September 24th in Washington D.C.
Date: Monday, September 24, 2018
Time:
10:40AM to 12:00PM
Room: Woodrow Wilson B
Please note, you must be registered for SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> to attend this workshop.
The SpringOne Platform Team
